content.prompt: In the second paragraph, the author develops a comparison between life and “a thousand arrows shot from the same point and aimed at the same object” primarily to suggest that

choices.label: people exhibit remarkable diversity in their development over time
seemingly different objects can have surprisingly similar characteristics
talented people often fail to recognize valuable opportunities
most great men have emerged from humble origins

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
